targets.query: SELECT distinct("distance") * 0.62137 FROM "weatherflow_evt_strike" WHERE ("station_name" =~ /^$station_name$/ AND "collector_type" =~ /^$collector_type$/) AND distance <= 42 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s) fill(null)
